text.div:
Search Parameter on related location resources for security

Parameter related-location:string

Search by related location for a PractitionerRole resource.

ResourcePractitionerRole
ExpressionPractitionerRole.extension('http://ihris.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/ihris-related-group').extension('location')
Processing ModeNormal
MultiplesThe parameter cannot repeat or have multiple values

name: Search Parameter on related location resources for security
description: Search by related location for a PractitionerRole resource.
